name: talentless
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having no natural ability to do something: a talentless singer People said that I was talentless, that I couldn't act. See
talent
More examplesFewer examplesIndeed, I even used to write until I realized just how talentless I was.Such groups are largely comprised of talentless, grasping wannabes manipulated by cynical profiteerers.She was vulgar apparently, and talentless as a singer.
